title: Online Project-Based Social Learning Design Support Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Social Science Concepts, Proficiency in Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Learners simultaneously develop theoretical and practical competencies through real-world social issue projects, participating in BYOD-enabled collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently design at least 80% of a social issue analysis project using online collaboration tools
Learners improve project deliverables at least twice through a peer feedback system in a PBL environment
Learners achieve at least 4.0/5.0 in online learning tool utilization skills through digital literacy assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
